title: Osher Center for Integrative Medicine
description: The Osher Center for Integrative Medicine, a collaboration between Harvard Medical School and Brigham and Women's Hospital, is focused on enhancing human health, resilience and quality of life.
cleaned_text: Networking modern science with integrative approaches to wellness The Osher Center for Integrative Medicine, a collaboration between Harvard Medical School and Brigham and Women's Hospital, is focused on enhancing human health, resilience and quality of life. We believe that by increasing our fundamental scientific understanding of human health, we are moving toward a new model of wellness and healing.
